Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Martyrdom of the Forty-Nine Martyrs and Elders of Scetis

Text.Language: Areh e~ron w~ Pi,~rictoc Pennou]: e~bol qen nidemwn nem nipiracmoc: hiten nip~recbia n~]macnou]: nem pih~me 'it m~marturoc.
Keep us, O Christ our God,Â / from demons and temptationsÂ / through the intercessions of the Mother of GodÂ / and the Forty-Nine Martyrs.

All joy and rejoicingÂ / has come to the monks from every nationality,Â / the soldiers of Immanuel,Â / because of the Forty-Nine Martyrs.

O David, come in our midst today,Â / to utter the honor of these martyrsÂ / of Christ the King of Glory,Â / the Forty-Nine Martyrs.
